Enum Potion.PotionColour

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<Potion.PotionColour>
      • Potion.PotionColour
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Potion.PotionColour>, java.lang.constant.Constable
    Enclosing class:
    Potion
    public static enum Potion.PotionColour
extends java.lang.Enum<Potion.PotionColour>
    Enumerates all the possible colours a Potion could have, with the sprites and names for these colours.
